attributes.action: Move st Patrick’s day parade to a further date
attributes.additional_details: St Patrick’s day parade is most people’s favourite day of the year. It doesn’t just represent Irish culture but it brings cultures together from all around the world.
attributes.background: Instead of cancelling st Patrick’s day parade. Simply move the date to when COVID-19 does not pose a threat to a wide spread.

rejection.details: This isn't a matter for the UK Government or Parliament, but for the local authority where the parade was due to take place.
